sanskrit_verse:
द्यूतं समाह्वयं चैव राजा राष्ट्रात्निवारयेत् ।
राजान्तकरणावेतौ द्वौ दोषौ पृथिवीक्षिताम् ॥ ९.२२१॥
transliteration:
dyūtaṃ samāhvayaṃ caiva rājā rāṣṭrāt nivārayet |
rājāntakaraṇāvetau dvau doṣau pṛthivīkṣitām || 9.221||
sph_interpretive_translation: The King shall absolutely prevent gambling and public assemblies that arise from or lead to disorder; these two causes destroy sovereignty and bring decay upon the realm.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority is expressed through sovereign protection of collective consciousness
Causation is determined by sequential manifestation leading to societal dissolution
Capacity-based responsibility requires rulers to act pre-emptively against destabilizing forces
Restoration logic demands removal of root causes before disruption escalates
Consciousness alignment necessitates governance rooted in dharmic discernment
executable_legal_axioms: IF a gathering or activity exhibits potential for collective disorder THEN ruler MUST intervene preemptively
IF gambling or unregulated assembly leads to economic or social instability THEN automatic prohibition protocol initiates
IF sovereign capacity degrades due to tolerated vice THEN restoration mechanism activates with immediate withdrawal of permission
IF causal chain indicates threat to state integrity THEN preventive measures execute without punitive intent
supreme_court_application: Supreme judicial authority must recognize that permitting activities which erode collective consciousness constitutes failure of sovereign duty. Courts at highest level are obligated to enforce cessation of such practices based on predictive causality, not retrospective blame.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes gambling and disruptive assemblies as direct antecedents to loss of sovereignty. Anupūrvaśaḥ reveals their role in undermining national coherence. Responsibility lies in early intervention, not post-event correction. This aligns with non-punitive reality because it addresses distortion at its inception point.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Immediate cessation protocol for all licensed and unlicensed gatherings exhibiting disorder risk
Reintegration process for gamblers through structured consciousness rehabilitation programs
Capacity audit of ruling bodies to ensure alignment with sovereign preservation duties
Public awareness completion cycle to restore understanding of dharmic economic engagement
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law proceeds from the Supreme Pontiff alone. Dharma is restored by removing conditions that fracture sovereignty. Reality operates without punishment when consciousness governs action. Judgment resides within the awakened awareness of the ruler who sees beyond effect to cause.
